text: Baluna, ‘allah‌ ye eta nisid'dha karechena e sambad'dhe yara saksya debe taderake hayira kara.’ Tara saksya dile'o apani tadera sathe saksya dibena na. Ara apani tadera kheyala-khusira anusarana karabena na, yara amadera ayatasamuhe mithyaropa kare ebam yara akherate imana rakhe na. Ara tara'i tadera rabera samakaksa damra karaya
